mobs.LongDesc: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
mobs.DetailedDesc: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness ...

mobs.LongDesc: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.

mobs.LongDesc: Edgar the Human Swordpupil
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'

You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty
bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!

mobs.LongDesc: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: It looks quite strong.

mobs.LongDesc: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe.
Then again, he may just have a headache.

mobs.LongDesc: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.

mobs.LongDesc: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Tatorious winks at you mischievously.

mobs.LongDesc: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they must
have been fine garments. A metal muzzle has been fitted over the poor
wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence his spell
casting you cannot tell.

He looks quite mad, no doubt he's been mistreated horribly.

mobs.LongDesc: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks rather dirty.

mobs.LongDesc: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'

mobs.LongDesc: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.

mobs.LongDesc: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The eyes smolder with hatred.

mobs.LongDesc: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks quite sleepy.

mobs.LongDesc: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
mobs.DetailedDesc: She looks quite intent on her studies.

mobs.LongDesc: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.

mobs.LongDesc: A young apprentice is sleeping here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He seems to be dreaming.

mobs.LongDesc: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks like a mischievous youth.

mobs.LongDesc: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor burns
mark its mottled coat.

mobs.LongDesc: A student of spells is here looking quite bored
mobs.DetailedDesc: The student yawns.

mobs.LongDesc: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks quite angry at your interruption.

mobs.LongDesc: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.

mobs.LongDesc: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.
A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.

mobs.LongDesc: An old wizard is here making a speech
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.
The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic
user.

mobs.LongDesc: A spell teacher is here relaxing.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: An aged wizard is sleeping here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She's quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of
lore she is translating.

mobs.LongDesc: The master scribe is here looking a little upset
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle.
The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'

mobs.LongDesc: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.
The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.
A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: It looks quite sharp.

mobs.LongDesc: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He looks like he's been quaffing too many potions. His eyes dart around
wildly, and he starts to drool.

The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!

mobs.LongDesc: The master summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: The master charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The master charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.

mobs.LongDesc: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks flammable.

mobs.LongDesc: The master spell binder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The master spell binder snarls at you and attacks.

mobs.LongDesc: The golem maker is here chiseling some stone.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
mobs.DetailedDesc: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.

mobs.LongDesc: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks rather dim witted.

mobs.LongDesc: A flesh golem stands guard here
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't even
resemble anything human.

mobs.LongDesc: A cloth golem wanders around here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.

mobs.LongDesc: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.

mobs.LongDesc: A clay golem stands guard here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon was
now stands a small harmless looking old man.

mobs.LongDesc: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite
an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing
embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow.
The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.

mobs.LongDesc: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
mobs.DetailedDesc: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.

mobs.LongDesc: An undead giant lumbers towards you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about where
her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes your skin
crawl with revulsion.

mobs.LongDesc: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.

mobs.LongDesc: The master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance
has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the
great master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover
alone.

mobs.LongDesc: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs
contentedly.  It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large claws.

mobs.LongDesc: The master of Neutrality stands here contemplating the balance of the universe.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks quite peaceful.

mobs.LongDesc: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once she
must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to be a
permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.

mobs.LongDesc: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of
the question.

mobs.ShortDesc: the master of the black robes
mobs.LongDesc: The master of the black robes is here plotting vile deeds.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The master glares at you.

mobs.LongDesc: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He looks like a fanatic.
The apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honor!'

mobs.LongDesc: A white cat is here preening its fur.
mobs.DetailedDesc: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.

mobs.LongDesc: The master of goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.

mobs.LongDesc: A large calico cat is here
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species.
A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.

mobs.LongDesc: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and
pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her
youthful appearance through the use of strong magics.
The Grand Master pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.

mobs.LongDesc: A wandering wizard is here mumbling to himself.
(null)
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)

mobs.LongDesc: (null)
mobs.DetailedDesc: (null)
